snippet.title: encerrar texto seleccionado en marca de ensayo moderna
hoja guía mel midi import
repeticiones con varios finales alternos flexibles
snippet.body: -*- menu: blocks; name: rfx \bar ".|:" $SELECTION \set Score.repeatCommands = #'((volta "1. 2. 3.")) c1 \bar ":|." \set Score.repeatCommands = #'((volta #f)) \set Score.repeatCommands = #'((volta "4")) c1 \set Score.repeatCommands = #'((volta #f)) \break
